document_data.name: Rosymorn Firewine
document_data.mainbody: '''Rosymorn firewine''' was a variety [[firewine]] distilled by the [[Rosymorn Monastery]] of [[Lathander]] before the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Rosymorn firewine had a pleasant color but had a harsh strong smell of alcohol and a weak soft flavor.
document_data.History: Rosymorn firewine was produced by the Rosymorn Monastery before its fall to a force of [[githyanki]] sometime in or shortly before the {{YearlinkName|1492}}. Bulbous green glass bottles of Rosymorn firewine could be found in the city of [[Baldur's Gate]] and in the locales of the [[Chionthar Valley]] in the late 15{{th}} century DR.
